quote_first: but he still remained confident that they could make it to the top when they reached 27,550 feet at
quote_last: . That was when he heard a cry that sounded like a wounded animal. He knew it wasn’t Finch.
title: Paths of Glory
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: ‘Anything else?’ he asked, stealing another glance at the clock:
quote_last:
. Still time to kill.
‘I had a word with my parole officer on Monday,’ said Faulkner, ‘and he made no mention of an early release.’
title: Next in Line
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: on Monday a blond young woman with what amounted to a crew cut came out of Susan’s office and took her yellow slicker off the rack and went out of the waiting room without looking at me.
title: Crimson Joy
author: Robert Parker
